pullrequest.title: Resubmit the mixtures of Gaussians code

content.html:
@mlibbrecht : Thank you very much. Convergence also seems to take a very long time (even simpleseg appears to be going to ~60 rounds), is that normal/expected?

Did Shiqi (or whoever was working on this) leave behind any notes, perchance, on what exactly they were doing with this? There aren't any comments, unfortunately, and it is difficult to get a picture of what is being done overall. I would like to fully understand what is happening before I commit any patches for multiple datasets, but it's a bit difficult to decipher.

Thanks in advance.
